org.dataconservancy.packaging.ingest.camel.impl.config

Annotation Type EmailNotificationsConfig


  • public @interface EmailNotificationsConfig
    Configuration properties supported by the EmailNotifications RouteBuilder. Methods on this interface are translated to Camel properties per Camel conventions: underscore characters are replaced with a period. So the method mail_smtpHost() would translate to the Camel property mail.smtpHost.
    mail.to
    Required: the comma-separated list of email address to deliver notifications to.
    mail.smtpHost
    Optional: the outbound SMTP server which will be responsible for delivering the notification email. N.B. the default mail server uses SMTP AUTH so you must supply a username and password if you use the default value for mail.smtpHost
    mail.smtpPort
    Optional: the outbound SMTP server port. Must be 465 (the default) if using the default mail.smtpHost
    mail.smtpUser
    Required if using the default mail.smtpHost: the username used to authenticate to the outbound SMTP server (aka SMTP AUTH). Use this if your SMTP server requires authentication in order to send email. Requires the use of SSL.
    mail.smtpPass
    Required if using the default mail.smtpHost: the password used to authenticate to the outbound SMTP server.
    mail.from
    Optional: the email address notifications will appear to be from.
    mail.subjectFailure
    Optional: the subject line of failed deposit notifications
    mail.subjectSuccess
    Optional: the subject line of successful deposit notifications
    mail.template
    Optional: the Velocity template used to render the body of a deposit notification.
    mail.debug
    Optional: set to true to debug the interaction with the SMTP server.
